channel.title: Picking colors
channel.description:
I'm a SCAR noob and do not thuroughly understand the concept of selecting colors. How do you do it?
I'm using http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,265.0.html <---That script and the author said that if you get stuck between the rune shop and the bank you need to manually set the colors because the bank is empty. Well, how do I do that? :S
I also heard that you need to have silent mouse turned off. How do you do that?
